titleStmt.title: The loyal subjects request for his royal sovereign. In a sermon preached to His Majesty's garrison in the Isles of Silly, [sic] and in several places since November last. / By Nicholas Philips, chaplain to His Majesty's garrison there..
titleStmt.author: Philips, Nicholas, b. 1621 or 2

titleStmt.title: The loyal subjects request for his royal sovereign. In a sermon preached to His Majesty's garrison in the Isles of Silly, [sic] and in several places since November last. / By Nicholas Philips, chaplain to His Majesty's garrison there..
titleStmt.author: Philips, Nicholas, b. 1621 or 2

notesStmt.note: This item is filmed with two title pages. At reel 1799:16, the first title is "The loyal subjects request for his royal sovereign"; at reel 2074:13a the first title page is "Loyalty and piety"
Bound preceding (at reel 2074:13a): The way to heaven clearly discovered (Wing P2038), which is filmed separately at reel 1799:17.
Reproductions of original in: British Library.
